description: System-generated unique identifier for a payment term, used to link terms to customers, vendors, invoices, and purchase orders.
Human-readable description of the payment terms displayed on financial documents and master data.
Number of days from the invoice date until the full amount becomes due.
Number of days from the invoice date during which early payment qualifies for a discount.
Discount rate applied to the invoice amount for early payment within the specified discount period.
Boolean indicator that the payment term is inactive and should not be used for new transactions; retained for historical reference.
